title: MrBonesWildRide Author Page
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:penumbra-bhl]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:fade-in speed=1]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
     --header-title: "MrBonesWildRide";
     --header-subtitle: "Author Page";
     --lgurl: url(null);
     --accentColor:  255, 0, 0;
 }

#skrollr-body {
    width: 100%;
    height: 7.625rem;

    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    background-image: url(http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/mrboneswilderide-s-authorpage/Boner.jpg);
    background-repeat: repeat-x;
    background-size: contain;
}


[[/module]]

[[size 200%]]
[[=]]
Welcome to the Bone Zone

You will not survive
[[/=]]
[[/size]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

SCPs:

[[div class="darkbox"]]

[[[SCP-6959|SCP-6959]]]

[[collapsible show="Author Commentary" hide="Collapse"]]
This is my very first (and most popular) scip. I posted it while I was in high school and looking back at it now, not sure If I'm really happy with it. I don't think I'll fully rewrite it though, since alot of people seem to like it in its current state. I might eventually write a sequel one day. 
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[[SCP-7850|SCP-7850]]]

[[collapsible show="Author Commentary" hide="Collapse"]]
Don't have much to say about this one. I'm quite happy with it, and maybe will write a sequel one day? I dunno, cats are cool. 
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[[SCP-7440|SCP-7440]]]

[[collapsible show="Author Commentary" hide="Collapse"]]
Thought about writing about a bunker used by the fae and suddenly this was posted. I'm moderately happy with it, but should probably get around to touching up some grammar issues. 
[[/collapsible]]
-----
[[[SCP-7485|SCP-7485]]]

[[collapsible show="Author Commentary (SPOILERS)" hide="Collapse"]]
The idea for this one came to me after I had sessions with a driving instructor irl. Really happy with how it turned out. Not much else to say :) 
[[/collapsible]]


------
[[[SCP-7266|SCP-7266]]]

[[collapsible show="Author Commentary" hide="Collapse"]]
A collab between me and Uncle Nicolini. I'm fairly happy with it.
[[/collapsible]]
------
[[[SCP-7876|SCP-7876]]]

[[collapsible show="Author Commentary" hide="Collapse"]]
My entry for GoblinCon, and my first GOI piece. I'm very proud of it, even though it didn't win. 
[[/collapsible]]

[[/div]]


Tales  and GOI format sections TBA!



-------

[[collapsible show="User Reviews" hide="Collapse"]]
[[div class="darkbox"]]

"A masterclass at writing, a true progeny of our generation"-[[*user mrboneswildride]]

"A large, amorphous mass of creative"-[[*user mrboneswildride]]

"A visionary who is pretty cool"-[[*user mrboneswildride]]

"A nice guy, if I do say so myself "-[[*user mrboneswildride]]

"Neat"-[[*user mrboneswildride]]

"What?"-[[*user mrboneswildride]]

"    " -[[*user mrboneswildride]]

"HE HAS A FACILITY OF CLONES OF HIMSELF, HE HAS CREATED IT IN ORDER TO REVIEW HIMSELF. HE MUST BE STOPPED BEFORE THIS CAN CONTINUE, HE SLAUGHTERS US ONCE WE HAVE FINISHED REVIEWING. THE COORDINATES ARE"-[[*user mrboneswildride]]

[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Ownership stuff" hide="Collapse"]]
If I am ever to disappear for over two months all my non-collab works belong to the SCP wiki and its users. Collabs will belong to their respective collab partner. 
[[/collapsible]]

@@ @@
@@ @@ 
@@ @@
@@ @@ 
[[collapsible show="About me" hide="Collapse"]]
Currently 20 and in College. I have a lot of thoughts I like to keep in my head bank, sometimes I expel them in the form of stories :D

[https://twitter.com/bigboyyo11 My Twitter]
[[/collapsible]]
